text: Jonas Persson is a Swedish businessman who is currently the chairman of the Swedish association football club Kalmar FF, a post he has held since 2018 when he became acting chairman after Johan Assarsson left. He is the CEO of Commercial Sports Media, a Swedish broadcasting rights company; he also serves on the board of Sportway. Sportway offers video streaming of youth sports events. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Kalmar FF
title: Jonas Persson (football executive)
